questions: What programming languages are you proficient in?
How many years of experience do you have in software development?
Are you available for full-time work?
Do you have experience with Agile methodologies?
What kind of projects have you worked on?
How do you keep your skills up-to-date?

responses.text: I have been programming in Python and Java for over 5 years. I'm also proficient in JavaScript and C++.
I have 7 years of experience in software development, including 3 years in a senior role.
I am available for full-time positions starting next month.
I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from XYZ University.
Yes, I have worked in Scrum teams for the past 4 years and am certified as a Scrum Master.
My key skills include data analysis, machine learning, and cloud computing.
I've worked on various projects, including a large-scale e-commerce platform and a real-time data analytics tool.
I'm open to relocation for the right opportunity.
My salary expectations are in the range of $90,000 to $120,000 per year, depending on the role and benefits package.
I hold AWS Certified Solutions Architect and Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer certifications.
I regularly attend tech conferences, participate in online courses, and contribute to open-source projects to keep my skills current.
